sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form
        ref="form">
        <v-dialog v-model="show" max-width="600" persistent>
            <v-card>
                <v-card-title>My Title</v-card-title>
                <v-text-field
                    :value="planname">
                </v-text-field>
                <v-btn
                    @click="close">
                    Close
                </v-btn>
            </v-card>
        </v-dialog>
    </v-form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'TestDialog',
    data: () => ({
    }),
    props: {
        value: Boolean,
        plan: Object,
    },
    computed: {
        show: {
            get() {
                console.log('value: ', this.value)
                return this.value
            },
            set(value) {
                var me = this
                me.$emit('input', value)
            },
        },
        planname: {
            get() {
                return this.plan.name
            },
            set() {

            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        close() {
            this.show = false
            this.$refs.form.reset()
        }
    }
}
</script>
